home.title:
COME FOR OUR SHOW
ENJOY OUR FOOD!
home.subsection1: Teppanyaki is a style of Japanese cuisine that uses an iron griddle to cook food. The word teppanyaki is derived from teppan , which means iron plate, and yaki, which means grilled, broiled, or pan-fried.
home.subsection2:
Having a good time with Friends and Family through a perfect meal is Toyo’s ultimate experience. Be prepared to share your laughter, conversation and amazing time with our Chefs who will be cooking in front of you

Toyo offers you a table which caters to any group-size. Our environment filled with amusement and laughter is perfect for individuals, couples, families, and catching up with friends.
home.subsection3:
A steak that will bring your tastebuds to Japan.

Served to you with soy based sauce cooked to perfection with our home-made original ginger sauce recipe on the side. Itidakimasu! Dig in!
home.subsection4: Not all chefs are  created equal. Our chefs specializes with Japanese cuisine throughout years of training and experience. But that’s not all, they will also entertain you with their skills and laughter!

menu.fulldinnerdesc: Your Toyo dinner includes shrimp appetizer, soup, salad and dessert, along with rice and tea. Each meal is prepared at your teppanyaki table in the finest Japanese tradition by our Toyo chefs and served with our oriental vegetables, all complimented by our own seasonings and exotics sauces.

menu.fulllunchdesc: Your Toyo lunch includes shrimp appetizer, soup, salad and dessert, along with rice and tea. Each meal is prepared at your teppanyaki table in the finest Japanese tradition by our Toyo chefs and served with our oriental vegetables, all complimented by our own seasonings and exotics sauces.

about.title:
PERFECTED
THROUGH TIME
about.introduction:
Since 1981, Toyo has not only offered their clients a gastronomical experience but a theatrical one as well. Using only the freshest and finest ingredients, one of our skilled and charismatic chefs will prepare your meal right before your eyes on a teppanyaki table. You may enjoy flambeed shellfish, fresh sauteed vegetables, delicious terriyaki chicken and our succulent cuts of beef while watching the spectacular show put on by our chefs. To compliment your wonderful meal, you may savor a great selection of wine, exotic Japanese cocktails of Japanese beer.

Whether you are looking for a family dinner, a place to host your corporate event or a restaurant to celebrate a special occasion Toyo has the right atmosphere and cuisine to make your experience memorable.
